  index: "my-index-000001",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      timestamp: {
        type: "date",
      },
      temperature: {
        type: "long",
      },

        type: "double",
      },
      node: {
        type: "keyword",
      },

        type: "double",
        on_script_error: "fail",
        script: {
          source:
            "\n        emit(doc['voltage'].value * params['multiplier'])\n        ",
